subject: Simsonn pro plus pedal brake issue
description_text:
Hi I bought the pedals a few months ago and had issues only with the brake pedal.
Whenever I don’t touch it, it inputs at 100 then as soon as I press it, it goes from 0-100 instantly almost like it’s not acting as a load cell pedal. Do you have any advice to fix this I have grounded it as shown in the photos as well as bought a usb isolator to try and solve the solution

conversations.body_text: Hi Ollie Whitby,     Have you downloaded the SIMSONN Manager software? If the interface shows “Version too old, not supported,” please go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware-plus.sfu to update the firmware. Once the update is complete, please be sure to recalibrate the pedals, as they will not function properly in games without calibration.   https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

I downloaded this and it doesn’t recognise the pedals only allowing the new
x model to be calibrated says it’s disconnected but if I use the older
software whenever I put pressure on the pedal floor it inputs brake travel
somehow


On Fri, 5 Sep 2025 at 02:10, service@simsonn.com

Hi Ollie Whitby, Please install the Todesk software. No registration is required, and if it prompts you to register, simply close the window. I can assist you remotely to resolve the issue right now.      https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe
